name: VR Hybrid War 2117 - VR 混合战争 2117
description: VR Hybrid War 2117 is an intense, action packed space shooting game. It has laser pistols, metallic enemy spiders, explosions, probes flying around trying to seek and destroy you. The mission is to destroy the enemy probe factory, liquid oxygen tank, space ship and a radar.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 600 MB available space
